description: Try our easy to follow Santa's Meat Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Beef pie,Zucchini,Seafood free,Christmas,Tree nut free,Mince,Sesame free,Beef,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Santa's Meat Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 3 minutes until soft. Add mince and cook, breaking up the lumps with a wooden spoon, until browned. Add flour and cook for 1 minute. Stir in carrot, zucchini, diced tomatoes, tomato paste and cup water. Simmer 10 minutes. Cool completely.

Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Grease a 12hole medium muffin tray. Use a 10cm round cutter to cut 12 rounds from pastry sheets. Cut out snowflake or star shapes from remaining pastry to decorate pies. Press rounds into muffin tray to line base and sides. Fill with meat mixture (see tip). Top pies with decorations and brush with egg. Bake for 20 minutes or until puffed and golden.
